header.description: Property. This message contains the definition of an orientation constraint.

orientation.description: Property. The desired orientation of the robot link specified as a quaternion

link_name.description: Property. The robot link this constraint refers to

absolute_x_axis_tolerance.description: Property. Tolerance on the three vector components of the orientation error (optional)

parameterization.description: Property. Defines how the orientation error is calculated The error is compared to the tolerance defined above

XYZ_EULER_ANGLES=0.description: Property. The different options for the orientation error parameterization - Intrinsic xyz Euler angles (default value)

ROTATION_VECTOR=1.description: Property. - A rotation vector. This is similar to the angle-axis representation, but the magnitude of the vector represents the rotation angle.

weight.description: Property. A weighting factor for this constraint (denotes relative importance to other constraints. Closer to zero means less important)
